name: Power Ball 2022
description:
Overview


Power Ball 2022 continues the excitement of its predecessor but with newer graphics and a polished space environmental back drop.

You will take on 50 levels of increasing difficulty to try to amass the points needed to reach the top of the leader board in this modern retro take of the classic bat / ball and brick breaking genre.

Keep your eye on the main ball and save it from destruction as you traverse space portals and collect powerups to help you clear the stage of alien blocks.

Features


* 50 levels
* Multiple power ups
* Crazy physics based gameplay
* Obstacles to either avoid or utilize
* Steam leader board for Global High Scores
* Steam leader boards for Level High Scores
* Save/Load function
* Steam Achievements
* In game Global Rank Notifications
